title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content: an Unholy Assassin of Bhaal. Embrace your Urge Become Bhaal's ultimate weapon - become his Slayer. Interfectorem Draconis Kill the Red Dragon in the Upper City. Just a Nibble Let Astarion bite you - ouch. Repairing the Weave Stablise Gale's Netherse orb. To Bloom in Darkest Night Gift Shadowheart a night orchid - her favourite flower. Always knew she was a softie. Loophole Break Wyll's Pact with Mizora. Hot Date Go on a date with Karlach - now that's playing with fire. Mind Blown Romance the Emp
